contents: You wake up alone in a dark forest, without a shred of memory.
An army of gigantic trees surround you. In between them lay small bushes, with red berries on them.
You observe the sun moving in the sky and learn its ways.
As you walk through the lonely woods, you hear howlings in the distance. Better hurry.
You are now in the warmth of your small cabin. Wolves can't get to you
